mapper.insert: insert into plan (memberId, planTitle, planDetail) values (#{memberId}, #{planTitle}, #{planDetail})
insert into description (planId, placeId, content, price, happy, departTime, arriveTime) values (#{planId}, #{placeId}, #{content}, #{price}, #{happy}, #{departTime}, #{arriveTime})
mapper.select: select * from plan where memberId = #{memberId} order by id desc limit 1
